Text: Daren Rahman v Lewis II Repeat or RevengeIMAGE Seven months after Hasim Rahmans crushing righthand blow sent Lennox Lewis into outer space Lewis had this to say on Wednesday I didnt get knocked out brutally I got knocked down was getting to my f eet when the ref did stop it My titles are on loan to Hasim Rahman I DON T RESPECT HIM The Nevada Athletic Commission immediately hired Rodney Da ngerfield to officiate the bout this Saturday at PM EST in Las Vegas At stake are the WBC IBF titles WBCIBF Heavyweight Championsh ip Fight Boxer Money Line Hasim The Rock Rahman Lenox Lewis FREE for Joining FREE for Depositing BONUS Cash on your first de positIMAGE Final Result of the Fight Outcome Odds Draw Lewis win by Decision Lewis win by KO Rahman win by Decision Rahman w in by KO Winner by Exact Round Outcome Odds Round Lewis Win s Round Rahman Wins Round Lewis Wins Round Rahma n Wins Round Lewis Wins Thank you for your time good luck IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE If you would rather not receive thes e messages please click here It will take up to hours for your requ est to take effect
